snippet.title: Poly Bridge: PAX West Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
In Poly Bridge, you get to unleash your engineering creativity with an engaging and fresh bridge-building simulator with all the bells and whistles.

Learn more about Poly Bridge for Nintendo Switch! https://goo.gl/zDsESj

#NintendoSwitch #PAXWest2017 #PolyBridge

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
